description:
Vittel was a part of the Assassin`s Guild http://anidb.net/ch84317 [Sham Lash] from the Parthevia Empire before his defection to join http://anidb.net/ch63160 [Sinbad] as one of the founders of Sindria Trading Company and eventually the nation of Sindria.
Source: Magi Wiki
name: Vittel
